law.catch_line: Felony conviction grounds for disciplinary action.

text.section: As used in this section, "state employee" means a person regularly appointed to a position in the state service, whether classified or unclassified, for which he is compensated on a full-time or part-time basis.
Subject to the provisions of KRS 18A.095, any state employee who is convicted of a felony may be subject to any disciplinary action deemed appropriate, including dismissal from the state service.

law.history: Created 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 203, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1988.

metadata.budget-ref: See State/Executive Branch Budget, 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 117, Pt. I, C, 2, (2) at 628. See State/Executive Branch Budget, 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 117, Pt. I, D, 10, (1) at 636.
